text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Thanks. It is an emergency like situation. The Covid19 prone pockets should be divided in small pockets. Each pocket should be monitored deeply and separately. Each pocket should be locked and sealed atleast for 15 days and prone pocket for 15 days from the last reported case.
